verses.verse: <S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> [and] <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H7227>numerous<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> you, do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> is with you.

"Now it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that when you are <S%H7126>approaching<s%> the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"And he shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H8085>'Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you are <S%H7126>approaching<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%> Do not be <S%H7401>fainthearted.<s%> <S%H3824><s%> Do not be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> or <S%H2648>panic,<s%> or <S%H6206>tremble<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them,
for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is the one who <S%H1980>goes<s%> with you, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you <S%H5973>against<s%> your <S%H340>enemies,<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> you.'

"The <S%H7860>officers<s%> also shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that has <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> and has not <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> it? Let him <S%H1980>depart<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2596>dedicate<s%> it.

'And <S%H4310>who<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that has <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> and has not <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H2490>use<s%> its <S%H2490>fruit<s%>? Let him <S%H1980>depart<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H2490>use<s%> its <S%H2490>fruit.<s%>

'And <S%H4310>who<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H781>engaged<s%> to a <S%H802>woman<s%> and has not <S%H3947>married<s%> her? Let him <S%H1980>depart<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>marry<s%> her.'

"Then the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H3372>afraid<s%> and <S%H7401>fainthearted<s%> <S%H3824><s%>? Let him <S%H1980>depart<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> so that he might not make his brothers' <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H4549>melt<s%> like his <S%H3824>heart.<s%>'

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that when the <S%H7860>officers<s%> have <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> they shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of <S%H6635>armies<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H7126>approach<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, you shall <S%H7121>offer<s%> it <S%H7121>terms<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H6030>agrees<s%> to <S%H6030>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with you and <S%H6605>opens<s%> to you, then it shall be that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are <S%H4672>found<s%> in it shall <S%H1961>become<s%> your <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor<s%> and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> you.
"However, <S%H518>if<s%> it does not <S%H7999>make<s%> <S%H7999>peace<s%> with you, but <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> you, then you shall <S%H6696>besiege<s%> it.

"When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> you shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2138>men<s%> in it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H2945>children<s%> and the <S%H929>animals<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> you shall <S%H962>take<s%> as <S%H962>booty<s%> for yourself; and you shall <S%H398>use<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

<S%H3651>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from you, <S%H834>which<s%> are not of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H2008>nearby.<s%>

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you as an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> you shall not <S%H2421>leave<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> that <S%H5397>breathes.<s%>

"But you shall <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them, the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you,

in <S%H4616>order<s%> that they may not <S%H3925>teach<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>detestable<s%> <S%H8441>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> for their <S%H430>gods,<s%> so that you would <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H6696>besiege<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> to <S%H3898>make<s%> <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it in order to <S%H8610>capture<s%> it, you shall not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> its <S%H6086>trees<s%> by <S%H5080>swinging<s%> an <S%H1631>axe<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them; for you may <S%H398>eat<s%> from them, and you shall not <S%H3772>cut<s%> them <S%H3772>down.<s%> For is the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> a <S%H120>man,<s%> that it should be <S%H4692>besieged<s%> by you?

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> are not <S%H3978>fruit<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> you shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down,<s%> that you may <S%H1129>construct<s%> <S%H4692>siegeworks<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H6213>making<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with you <S%H5704>until<s%> it <S%H3381>falls.<s%>
